I too had the problem in which the game was not starting(was shown in task manager for a few seconds). I tried a lot to solve it and came up with the solution. Just do a Clean Startup and then start the game.
For a clean startup:
1. Type msconfig in the start search box and hit enter
2.Choose "selective startup" and uncheck "Load startup items"
3.Got to "services" tab, check "hide all microsoft services", and then click "Disable All"
4.Click OK and then Restart...

Your game should now be running... All the best.... :)
